definition[0]: the hand when it is tightly closed, so that the fingers are curled in towards the palm. People close their hand in a fist when they are angry or are going to hit someone
example[0]: She held the money tightly in her fist.
example[1]: Malcolm clenched his fist  (=held his fist very tightly closed) angrily.
example[2]: Dooley stood up and shook his fist in her face.
example[3]: Varney slammed his fist down onto the table so hard the dishes jumped.
